articles.description: More middle and high school students are abusing prescription ADHD drugs like Adderall and Ritalin, which treat symptoms of ADHD like inattention, hyperactivity and impulsivity.
articles.content: In recent years, an increasing number of middle and high school students are misusing prescription ADHD medications, with a University of Michigan study indicating that one in four are abusing stimul… [+2357 chars]

articles.author: Jigyasa Kakwani
articles.title: 15 foods to eat on the keto diet - Times of India
articles.description: Following the keto diet? Here is a list of foods you can eat.
articles.content: Make a refreshing zucchini salad by slicing it thinly and combining with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
